title: "3D imaging"
---

Acquire continuous time-lapse images utilizing ThorCam while moving two motorized stages by "Sequence" function of Kinesis. And convert acquired xyt image data set to xyz image data set.

-   1 Camera and software are exchangeable, if they can capture continuous time-lapse images and save them as tif format
-   2 Manual jog operation of the speed wheel enables the same job.
-   3 Original program to control the whole process is also under construction.
